discussion_comments.comment_body: It's from the paths-filter tool; anything in the `/docs` path. There are probably ways to configure that rule to include other files as well, but this is easy for now.

discussion_comments.comment_body:
It references the docs paths filiter [here](https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/blob/main/.github/changes-filter.yaml#L20)
And also checks that no python or frontend code is changed
@jordanrfrazier idk if CodeRabbit is hallucinating, but we do want to be sure this bypass only happens if the changes are exclusively in `langflow/docs`.

This suggestion makes sense to me, I have added it
@jordanrfrazier take a look - i have approved, merge if this makes sense to you too
